name: SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer Metadata Uploader反序列化漏洞
product: ["SAP SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer Metadata Uploader"]
description: SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer Metadata Uploader是SAP NetWeaver中的一个组件，用于上传元数据。SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer Metadata Uploader存在反序列化漏洞，该漏洞源于反序列化恶意内容，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致主机系统安全受损。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://support.sap.com/en/my-support/knowledge-base/security-notes-news/may-2025.html
patch: SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer Metadata Uploader反序列化漏洞的补丁
